price: 53. Waxaanu dhab ahaan siinnay Muuse hanuun, dhaxalsiinnayna ilmahii Israa’iil Kitaabka (Towraadda),
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡهُدَىٰ وَأَوۡرَثۡنَا بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsā al-hudā wa-awrathnā banī is'rāīla al-kitāba
